overview:
Meet M.B. Wilson & Co., LLC is comprised of strategic business advisors whose mission is to create a collaborative culture that puts our client’s needs first. As successful and seasoned entrepreneurs and CXO’s, we specialize is designing, implementing and optimizing business strategies to fully enhance and grow the value of early-stage to $20 million revenue enterprises. Periodically, we also make direct investments in early-stage companies and acquisitions of lower middle-market firms.

We offer the following management and business advisory services to ensure your success: •Strategic Planning & Facilitation •Outsourced Corporate Finance •Outsourced Business Development •Interim Executive Management

M.B. Wilson & Co., LLC makes direct or venture capital-like investments in early-stage growth companies with annual revenues greater than $500,000. We invest in exceptional firms that are comprised of extraordianry people and opportunity. Typical initial investments range from $1 to $3 million.

We make selective private equity acquisitions of lower middle-market companies with $5 to $10 million in annual revenue and EBITDA margins greater than 10%.

M.B. Wilson & Co., LLC’s investment focus is on business services, IT, high technology firms located in Colorado.

Each of our team members have an extensive business background in strategic and tactical planning, and general management.

In addition, we are individually experts in: - sales & marketing, - corporate governance & finance, and - operational improvement.

The M.B. Wilson & Co., LLC team provides management and business advisory services to the following industries: •Nanotechnology & Material Science •Biotechnology & Life Sciences •Information Technology •Clean & Alternative Energy •Professional Services •Family-owned businesses
